ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Active servers?
ygData.msgSnippet: What is a Drak? And how many expansions are there now? I couldn t get back into it even if I really wanted to because there is no way in hell I could download
ygData.messageBody:
What is a Drak? And how many expansions are there now?
I couldn't get back into it even if I really wanted to
because there is no way in hell I could download the
patches and such with my connection. I've got
Hughes.net Satellite and it totally blows. They have a
limit on how much I can download per day and there are
all sorts of problems with their software that makes
the 'net stop working.
When I play World of Warcraft my latency is around
1200ms on a good day. Most of the time its over 1500ms
and its not unusual to have 2300ms.
Have they fixed zoning, damage misreporting, or the
memory leaks in EQ?
Too bad its been so long that my characters are not
really worth much now. I'd be tempted to sell them so
they could go on being played by someone else.
Plus some natural disasters have left me with
financial problems. :-(
luv,
-Su

--- "D. Scott Smith" <scott@...> wrote:

> Any Tribunal players out there? I'm trying to get
> back into the game
> myself. Just started a newbie Druid named Rhnias (
> a Drak )
> I popped into Nexus... empty, I popped into Butcher
> Block...empty...
> Dawnshroud Peak... empty....Freeport.... empty....
> it was surreal. I
> haven't played since Planes of Power came out and
> the only place I saw
> any activity was Plane of Knowledge =( This was
> all at different times
> over the weekend.
>
> Hope everyone is doing great!
> D. Scott Smith
>
> I don't miss some of the insane crowds but empty...
> that just gave me
> chills.
>

Sesquipedalianism is the verbal shield of pusillanimous eremites, hence we must eschew esoteric obfuscation and thereby obviate our opprobrium.
